base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray metal detector frame.
part_description: Consists of two vertical pillars and a horizontal top bar, forming a rectangular frame.
internal_interaction_description: The vertical pillars support the horizontal top bar, forming a stable frame. Sensors are likely embedded within the pillars to detect metal objects passing through the frame.
external_interaction_description: Designed for people to walk through, detecting metal objects. Commonly used at security checkpoints in airports, schools, or events to ensure safety by identifying concealed metal items.
